verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You gave it all for me
My soul desire, my everything
All I am is devoted to You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
How could I fail to see
You are the love that rescued me
All I am is devoted to You

verse.name: p1
verse.lines:
Oh, how could I not be moved?
Lord here with You
So have your way in me
Cause Lord there is just one thing
That I will seek

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
This is my cry my one desire
To be where you are Lord
Now and forever
More than a song
My one desire
Is to be with You
Is to be with You
Jesus

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
The one thing
The one thing
That I ask is to be with you
